name: Inspector
tagline: Figma for Claude Code
description: Inspector is a visual editor that connects to your favorite AI agent (Claude Code, Codex, Cursor). Click on an element in your UI, tweak it visually, and Inspector writes the change to your codebase. No more design handoff, just push to the repo.

name: Extrovert
tagline: Lead nurturing and warm outreach copilot for LinkedIn
description: Track your prospects, customers and relevant topics on LinkedIn. AI suggests comments and DMs based on your playbook. You review and send. Build trust at scale in 15 minutes a day.

name: Axel
tagline: Todoist for AI coding agents
description: Axel helps you run AI agents and keep them fed. Queue up work, dispatch to the right agent, and approve or deny actions from one inbox. It's native macOS, keyboard-driven, and works with Claude, Codex, OpenCode, and Antigravity out of the box. We hope it helps you ship faster ðŸš€

name: VolumeHub
tagline: Per-app volume control for macOS with no driver installs
description: macOS has always been missing per-app volume control. VolumeHub fixes that. Control each app's volume independently from your menu bar. Turn down Spotify while keeping Discord loud â€” no System Settings needed. Built on Apple's native Audio Tap API â€” no kernel extensions, no audio drivers. Features a 10-band per-app EQ, Focus Audio that auto-ducks apps during calls, live audio meters, and three view modes. 100% private. Zero data collection. Zero tracking. Native SwiftUI.

name: Snap
tagline: The floating dock for developers
description: Snap is a floating dock for Cursor and Claude Code. Watch productivity reels, take screenshots, speech to text, generate and optimize prompts, copy console errors, visual editing, preview web, and custom action buttons.

name: One Minute News
tagline: Learning what happened around the world in one minute.
description: In todayâ€™s internet, headlines have become traps. They tease. They mislead. They make you click, only to find that the story is nothing like what you expected. We built oneminutenews.org as a response to the clickbait age. Our mission is simple: Give you the news in straight forward language and rank them based on their importance. The result? Clear, honest, no-fluff headlines that tell you exactly what happened, the way real journalism used to.

name: Sway
tagline: Turn spoken thoughts into clear structure.
description: Sway is for people who think better by talking than typing. Just speak your thoughts naturally. While walking, thinking, or reflecting. Sway listens and turns what you say into clear summaries, key points, and actions. No prompts. No formatting. Just speak -> clarity.

name: StayAwake.Dev
tagline: The one tab developers never close
description: StayAwake.Dev is a single tab productivity hub for developers who live in the browser. It brings together the tools you usually keep open in multiple tabs into one focused workspace with no installs or sign ups. Includes a flip clock, Pomodoro timer, Stay Awake screen lock, tasks with priorities, and essential dev utilities like UUID, Base64, hashes, JWT, JSON formatter, regex, URL tools, and timestamps. Built to stay open all day and eliminate tab chaos.

name: Sunday
tagline: The beautiful way to save and collect your books quotes
description: How many great ideas have you highlighted, only to close the book and never see them again? We all do it. We dog-ear pages, snap messy photos that get lost in our camera roll, or scribble in margins. We tell ourselves weâ€™ll remember that profound sentence, but we rarely do. Sunday fixes this. It is a purpose-built tool designed to make capturing wisdom as seamless as reading it. Reading is an investment of your time and attention. Sunday ensures you get to keep the returns.

name: OpenClaw Mac mini M4 Enclosure
tagline: Every powerful little crustacean needs a proper shell!
description: The OpenClaw Mac mini M4 Enclosure is a fun, display-worthy 3D printed case for your OpenClaw/Clawdbot/Moltbot device. Itâ€™s a perfect blend of cute character + clean desk setup, turning your Mac mini into a chunky little desk companion. Designed with real-world usability in mind, this enclosure was thoughtfully shaped to fit the Mac mini snuglyâ€”while keeping things practical: ports stay accessible and the design is made to avoid interfering with cooling. So you get the vibes and the function.

name: Helpmaton
tagline: Your AI agents, organized. No chaos, just workspaces.
description: Helpmaton is the workspace-based platform to build, manage, and scale AI agents without the chaos. Organize agents into dedicated workspaces with shared knowledge, custom budgets, and team permissions. ðŸš€ Key Features: â€¢ Memory & Docs: Agents learn from chats and your files. â€¢ Native Integrations: Google Workspace & Notion (OAuth). â€¢ Deployment: Slack/Discord bots. â€¢ Multi-Agent: Task delegation & web search. â€¢ Flexibility: BYO API keys or use ours. Open-source ready.

name: Planndu
tagline: Daily task planner with built in focus timer
description: Built for busy minds. No login required. Your tasks are stored 100% locally and securely. Most planners help you list tasks, Planndu helps you complete them.

name: NeoTiler
tagline: The Professional Window Manager for macOS
description: NeoTiler is a Swift-native window manager designed to end the desktop chaos on macOS. It introduces 'Workspaces' to help you group apps and switch between tasks instantly. Built for speed, efficiency, and a clean workflowâ€”no more manual resizing, just focus on what matters. Now with support for 10 different languages to offer a truly global experience. Supported Languages: English, Turkish, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Danish.

name: Dreamful
tagline: Understand your dreams. Understand yourself.
description: Dreamful is a dream app I built to understand dreams as reflections of the subconscious, not predictions. You describe your dreams in your own words, and an AI model helps analyze the symbols, emotions, and patterns behind them. Instead of generic dream dictionaries, Dreamful offers personal and culturally aware insights shaped by psychology and daily life. Over time, it becomes a quiet place to notice recurring themes and better understand what is going on inside.

name: MardiPay
tagline: Send crypto using simple IDs instead of wallet addresses
description: MardiPay makes crypto payments feel familiar. Instead of copying long wallet addresses, users send and receive SOL, USDC, or EURC using simple Sol IDs like a UPI handle. Payments happen instantly, balances are always accurate, and transaction history is easy to understand. No seed phrases. No confusing addresses. No crypto complexity. Currently live on Solana Devnet and built with a focus on correctness, safety, and everyday usability.

name: Speech to Text Converter Online
tagline: Audio and Video to text. Works with any file format.
description: Speech to text converter free online. Transcribe audio files, videos, voice recordings, and MP3 into accurate text in 50+ languages. No download required.

name: Trust SEO
tagline: Prove your SEO and expedite your organic growth
description: Discover top-performing websites ranked by verified SEO authority. Compare real Google Search Console metrics, growth rates, and proprietary TrustSEO scores. Earn a TrsutSEO Verified Badge and get early access to Member Mentions Network

name: Orcha
tagline: Your local AI dev team - orchestrate agents visually
description: Orcha lets you build and orchestrate teams of specialized AI agents for software development. Visual workflow builder, pre-built agent templates, and a unified dashboard - all running 100% locally with your own API keys. Your code, your data, your control.

name: RexIDE
tagline: IDE for ClaudeCode, Codex, OpenCode
description: Command center for nonstop shipping Keep AI agents like OpenCode, Claude, and Codex hot across projects â€” plus terminals, repos, reviews, auto insigts for diffs, diff view, voice input, and much more.

name: FileFlip - File Converter
tagline: Fast, secure, private, no cloud uploads. No creepy ads.
description: The FBI warned that free online converters distribute malware. I'd been uploading client docs, tax files, and contracts to random sites for years. So I built FileFlip â€” a desktop file converter that works 100% offline. - 70+ formats (images, docs, audio, video) - Zero uploads â€” files never leave your computer - 5MB app â€” Rust/Tauri, not bloated Electron - $9.99 one-time â€” no subscription, no account Your files stay on your machine. That's it.
